channel.title: A - Levels?
channel.description: what are/have you taken/taking for your A-Levels? me im taking Maths. Science Physics and ICT

item.title: A - Levels?
item.dc:creator: @RHS100 RHS100
item.description:
@RHS100 wrote:

[quote=“Greeny, post:6, topic:217176”]You can do as many A-levels as you want Magma, It’s just most people take 4 AS levels then drop 1 in the 2nd year.

Presuming these are UK A levels. And what the hell is “science” there is no plain science A level.

good* subjects imo lessons

…means good* subjects in my opinion lessons?

What?![/quote]
lol wtf i think i changed it to make it worse i meant there good subjects

Read full topic

item.title: A - Levels?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Greeny:

Presuming these are UK A levels. And what the hell is “science” there is no plain science A level.

Pretty sure the college I’m going to allows you to take just “science”. Not too sure though.

For me I am taking: Decision maths, Physics, Computing and Philosophy.

What I will drop in my second year is all up to how I fare with the subjects. I’m pretty sure I will drop Philosophy but who knows, I might do great in that and suck at Computing.

Read full topic

item.title: A - Levels?
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

English authority, maths b, (hardest math in Australian high school, or QLD at least) technology studies, (similar to manual arts but is mostly design, ergonomics etc) athletics extension, physics and PE. I was doing information processing technology but this year the subject switched from programming to learning how to use access, so I switched to PE. I am also looking to drop physics so I can take on a part time apprenticeship because I basically got all I could from the subject last year.

Read full topic

item.description:
@RHS100 wrote:

[quote=“Kane., post:2, topic:217176”]From a quick google search i presume A-Levels there are what subjects we’d be taking in year 12.
If not, i don’t care, i’m going to post anyway.

Physics, Chemistry, Entertainment Industry Theater, Ancient History, English Advanced Extension 1 & 2.

How much fun for me.
